## Enumerations

### enum  {#a0765e098fe7aae0f01b60ec890ac1b52}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum llvm::outliner::InstrType ">
Represents how an instruction should be mapped by the outliner.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a0765e098fe7aae0f01b60ec890ac1b52a5b2760b5bb9cc62190d2ddfe563776b9" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Legal">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a0765e098fe7aae0f01b60ec890ac1b52a6adc06fdab039cdbfaaeda00060c5e63" />
<EnumerationListItem name="LegalTerminator">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a0765e098fe7aae0f01b60ec890ac1b52a795f5ad85ed392b65a70b46dacaeef34" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Illegal">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a0765e098fe7aae0f01b60ec890ac1b52add798e74afcdf046a9a39e477261ab0e" />
<EnumerationListItem name="Invisible">

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

<code>Legal</code> instructions are those which are safe to outline. <code>LegalTerminator</code> instructions are safe to outline, but only as the last instruction in a sequence. <code>Illegal</code> instructions are those which cannot be outlined. <code>Invisible</code> instructions are instructions which can be outlined, but shouldn&#39;t actually impact the outlining result.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoutliner-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machineoutliner-h">MachineOutliner.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
